name: Get It Out - Extra Credits 2020
description: Submission for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2020. You're in charge of taking care of your house but a crazy ball got loose and is on a path to destroy everything. Guide it out of your house by using yourself as a paddle. But be careful! If the ball were to hit anything breakable(TVs, vases, microwaves, glass tables, windows, bird baths, etc.), you will fail.
